text: Juan Diego Ruiz Moreno (14 December 1942 – 28 April 2022), professionally known as Juan Diego, was a Spanish actor. His career began in 1957. He appeared in the movies The Holy Innocents, The 7th Day, Dragon Rapide, París- Tombuctú and You're the One. Diego was born in Seville, Spain. He won three Goya Awards (1991, 1999, 2006) during his career. Diego died on 28 April 2022 in Madrid, Spain at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Spanish stage actors Category:Spanish voice actors Category:People from Seville Category:Goya Award winners
title: Juan Diego (actor)
